rules.description: CAPS_LOCK to HYPER (SHIFT+COMMAND+OPTION+CONTROL) or ESCAPE (If Alone)

manipulators.description: Avoid starting sysdiagnose with the built-in macOS shortcut cmd+shift+option+ctrl+,
Avoid starting sysdiagnose with the built-in macOS shortcut cmd+shift+option+ctrl+.

from.description: Avoid starting sysdiagnose with the built-in macOS shortcut cmd+shift+option+ctrl+/

rules.description: Toggle caps_lock by pressing left_shift then right_shift
Remap right_command to left_control when used with other keys, and to return when pressed alone
Remap Left_Control+Right_Option to Left_Command+Right_Option
Hyper + i/j/k/l == vim directional Keys
Hyper + t + j to Command + Option + Left Arrow
Hyper+S to Control+Alt to use vs code editor splitting combos
Hyper+m to gcmsg
Hyper+V to Control+Shift to use vs code split editor focus combos
Hyper + F + I/J/K/L to select text like Vim while holding F
Hyper + N to delete (backspace)
Hyper + Command + N to delete the previous word
Hyper + Y to select the previous word
Hyper + O to select the subsequent word
Hyper + E to type an equals sign (=)
Hyper + P to type an open parantheses (()
Hyper + U to type an underscore (_)
Hyper + A to type '->'
Hyper + D to type a dash (-)
Hyper + X to type exclamation mark (!)
Hyper + C to type a hashtag (#)
Hyper + Q to type a question mark (?)
Hyper + W to type an open curly bracket ({)
Hyper + R to type an open bracket ([)
Remap Fn-H to Rectangle snap left
Remap Fn-J to Rectangle snap down
Remap Fn-L to Rectangle snap right
Remap Fn-K to Rectangle snap up
Remap Fn-M to Rectangle maximize
o Launcher
